title: Onion or not?
description: Game. Gets two headlines from Reddit, one real and one fake. Pick the real one. How many can you get in a row?

title: What's on tonight?
description: Displays the prime time US scripted TV shows airing on a given day. Season premieres are highlighted with yellow borders.

title: Portfolio
description: Personal portfolio built with React (because I love JSX) and styled with Sass.
